content: Taiwanese actor **River Huang** ([Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters): 黃河; [Pe̍h-ōe-jī](/wiki/Pe%CC%8Dh-%C5%8De-j%C4%AB): *N̂g Hô*; born November 13, 1989) is a Taiwanese actor. He is the first actor signed by the director [Yee Chin-yen](/wiki/Yee_Chin-yen). At age 18, Huang won the Best Actor award at the [Golden Bell Awards](/wiki/Golden_Bell_Awards) for his debut role in *[Dangerous Mind](/wiki/Dangerous_Mind)*, making him the youngest actor to win in that category. In 2009, he starred in Swedish-Taiwanese film *[Miss Kicki](/wiki/Miss_Kicki)*. And in 2010, he starred in *Juliets*, a Taiwanese film inspired by [William Shakespeare](/wiki/William_Shakespeare)'s tragic love story *[Romeo and Juliet](/wiki/Romeo_and_Juliet)*. ## Filmography ### Film YearEnglish titleOriginal titleRoleNotes2009*[Miss Kicki](/wiki/Miss_Kicki)*霓虹心Didi2010*Juliets*茱麗葉Hsiao-lo"Two Juliets"2010*The Pieces*小情小愛Short film2011*War Game 229*燃燒吧！歐吉桑Hsiao-wu2011*10+10*—N/aYoung Man in ParkShort film, segment "Green Island Serenade"2012*Cathy No.5*凱西五號Short film2012*[The Ghost Tales](/wiki/The_Ghost_Tales)*變羊記A-chuan2013*Trust City*信任心城市Short film2014*My Mandala*原來你還在Kuo Yin2014*Meeting Dr. Sun*行動代號：孫中山Man in metroalternative title: *Salute!
